Service Details: - Provides a non-court alternative for RCMP referrals involving youth ages 12-17 who commit minor offenses- Youth participate in a process where they acknowledge responsibility, learn how others are affected and take steps to repair the harm done- A trained Volunteer Mentor assists the youth in completing the agreement on time
